verses.verse: So <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> are <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> and <S%H2009>behold<s%> the <S%H1832>tears<s%> of such as were <S%H6217>oppressed,<s%> and they had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5162>comforter;<s%> and on the <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of their <S%H6231>oppressors<s%> there was <S%H3581>power;<s%> but they had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5162>comforter.<s%>

Wherefore <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7623>praised<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4191>dead<s%> which are <S%H7945>already<s%> <S%H3528><s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> more <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H1992><s%> are <S%H5728>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>

Yea, <S%H2896>better<s%> is he than <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> <S%H853>they,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H5728>yet<s%> <S%H1961>been,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

Again, <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5999>travail,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3788>right<s%> <S%H4639>work,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> for <S%H1931>this<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7068>envied<s%> of his <S%H4480>neighbor.<s%> <S%H7453><s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
The <S%H3684>fool<s%> foldeth his hands <S%H2263>together,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H398>eateth<s%> <S%H853><s%> his own <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H4480>handful<s%> <S%H4393><s%> <S%H3709><s%> with <S%H5183>quietness,<s%> than both the <S%H2651>hands<s%> <S%H4480>full<s%> <S%H4393><s%> with <S%H5999>travail<s%> and <S%H7469>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> alone, and there is <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H8145>second;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> he hath <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H1121>child<s%> nor <S%H251>brother:<s%> yet is there <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5999>labor;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> is his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with <S%H6239>riches;<s%> neither saith he, For <S%H4310>whom<s%> do <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H6001>labor,<s%> and <S%H2637>bereave<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> of <S%H4480>good?<s%> <S%H2896><s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> yea, <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H7451>sore<s%> <S%H6045>travail.<s%>
Two <S%H8147><s%> are <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H259>one;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H3426>have<s%> a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7939>reward<s%> for their <S%H5999>labor.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> they <S%H5307>fall,<s%> the <S%H259>one<s%> will lift <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H2270>fellow:<s%> but <S%H337>woe<s%> to him that is <S%H259>alone<s%> when he <S%H7945>falleth;<s%> <S%H5307><s%> for he hath <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H8145>another<s%> to help him <S%H6965>up.<s%>
Again, <S%H1571><s%> <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> lie <S%H7901>together,<s%> then they have <S%H2552>heat:<s%> but <S%H349>how<s%> can <S%H259>one<s%> be <S%H3179>warm<s%> alone?

And <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> prevail <S%H8630>against<s%> him, <S%H8147>two<s%> shall <S%H5975>withstand<s%> <S%H5048><s%> him; and a <S%H8027>threefold<s%> <S%H2339>cord<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> <S%H5423>broken.<s%>

Better <S%H2896><s%> is a <S%H4542>poor<s%> and a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> than an <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H4480>king,<s%> <S%H4428><s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3045>will<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> be <S%H2094>admonished.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> out of <S%H4480>prison<s%> <S%H1004><s%> <S%H631><s%> he <S%H3318>cometh<s%> to <S%H4427>reign;<s%> <S%H3588>whereas<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> he that is <S%H3205>born<s%> in his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> becometh <S%H7326>poor.<s%>

I <S%H7200>considered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> which <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> shall stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> even of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: they <S%H1571>also<s%> that come <S%H314>after<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in him. <S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1892>vanity<s%> and <S%H7475>vexation<s%> of <S%H7307>spirit.<s%>
